plot: Ashraf marries the daughter of a rich businessman, hoping to inherit her fortune. When she marries him against her father's wishes, she is disinherited from her father's wealth.
title: Dheriyaa
plot_es: Ashraf marries the daughter of a rich businessman, hoping to inherit her fortune. When she marries him against her father's wishes, she is disinherited from her father's wealth.
plot_en: Ashraf marries the daughter of a rich businessman, hoping to inherit her fortune. When she marries him against her father's wishes, she is disinherited from her father's wealth.
